name: Destin's Destiny
description: You play as Destin as you run across the desert as long as possible before you run out of water. Be careful and watch out for birds and cacti as they take some of your water when you hit them. You can protect yourself with a shield and rehydrate by picking up water bottles. As the game goes on it gets faster and faster, fortunately if you can catch the stopwatches you can slow things back down again.
